body:
I have installed Gitian in a VirtualBox with Debian 7.8 as described in doc/gitian-building.md 

When I try to Bitcoin `v0.10.0` I got an error:
```
debian@debian:~/gitian-builder$ ./bin/gbuild --commit bitcoin=v0.10.0 ../bitcoin/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-linux.yml
--- Building for precise amd64 ---
Stopping target if it is up
Making a new image copy
stdin: is not a tty
Starting target
Checking if target is up
Preparing build environment
Updating apt-get repository (log in var/install.log)
Installing additional packages (log in var/install.log)
Grabbing package manifest
stdin: is not a tty
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
./bin/gbuild:21:in `system!': failed to run on-target -u root bash < target-bin/grab-packages.sh > var/base-precise-amd64.manifest (RuntimeError)
        from ./bin/gbuild:100:in `build_one_configuration'
        from ./bin/gbuild:257:in `block (2 levels) in <main>'
        from ./bin/gbuild:252:in `each'
        from ./bin/gbuild:252:in `block in <main>'
        from ./bin/gbuild:250:in `each'
        from ./bin/gbuild:250:in `<main>'
```

Tail of var/install.log has no errors:
```
...
Setting up gcc-multilib (4:4.6.3-1ubuntu5) ...
Setting up bsdmainutils (8.2.3ubuntu1) ...
update-alternatives: using /usr/bin/bsd-write to provide /usr/bin/write (write) in auto mode.
update-alternatives: using /usr/bin/bsd-from to provide /usr/bin/from (from) in auto mode.
Setting up m4 (1.4.16-2ubuntu1) ...
Setting up autoconf (2.68-1ubuntu2) ...
Setting up autoconf2.13 (2.13-61) ...
Setting up autotools-dev (20120210.1ubuntu1) ...
Setting up automake (1:1.11.3-1ubuntu2) ...
update-alternatives: using /usr/bin/automake-1.11 to provide /usr/bin/automake (automake) in auto mode.
Setting up lib32stdc++6 (4.6.3-1ubuntu5) ...
Setting up g++-4.6-multilib (4.6.3-1ubuntu5) ...
Setting up g++-multilib (4:4.6.3-1ubuntu5) ...
Setting up libtool (2.4.2-1ubuntu1) ...
Setting up pkg-config (0.26-1ubuntu1) ...
Setting up binutils-gold (2.22-6ubuntu1.2) ...
Setting up faketime (0.8-1) ...
Processing triggers for libc-bin ...
ldconfig deferred processing now taking place
lxc-start: Connection refused - inotify event with no name (mask 32768)
```
I tried to build Bitcoin master, but got the same error.
title: Gitian build error in Debian 7.8
